intro:
Hum, sing, dance and rejoice with the official Touhou Spell Carnival Digital Soundtrack. With a whopping 49 tracks to choose from, you're sure to find your favorite Touhou tune!

Tracklist:
・Scarlet Destiny (Short Ver.)
・Maiden's Capriccio ~ Dream Battle -Spell Carnival Arrangement-
・Love-Colored Master Spark -Spell Carnival Arrangement-
・Lunar Clock ~ Luna Dial -Spell Carnival Arrangement-

・U.N. Owen Was Her? -Spell Carnival Arrangement-
・Hiroari Shoots a Strange Bird ~ Till When? -Spell Carnival Arrangement-
・Doll Judgment ~ The Girl Who Played with People's Shapes - Spell Carnival Arrangement-
・Bloom Nobly, Ink-Black Cherry Blossom ~ Border of Life -Spell Carnival Arrangement-
・Necrofantasia -Spell Carnival Arrangement-
・Lunatic Eyes ~ Invisible Full Moon -Spell Carnival Arrangement-
・Reach for the Moon, Immortal Smoke -Spell Carnival Arrangement-
・The Youkai Mountain ~ Mysterious Mountain -Spell Carnival Arrangement-
・Faith is for the Transient People -Spell Carnival Arrangement-
・Catastrophe in Bhavaagra ~ Wonderful Heaven -Spell Carnival Arrangement-
・Bhavaagra as Seen Through a Child's Mind -Spell Carnival Arrangement-
・Satori Maiden ~ 3rd Eye -Spell Carnival Arrangement-

・Emotional Skyscraper ~ Cosmic Mind -Spell Carnival Arrangement-
・Prince Shoutoku's Pegasus ~ Dark Pegasus -Spell Carnival Arrangement-
・The Concealed Four Seasons -Spell Carnival Arrangement-
・Secret God Matara ~ Hidden Star in All Seasons. -Spell Carnival Arrangement-
